cards.name: Anti-Venom
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set the Cost and Power of your deck's top card to 0.

cards.name: Daredevil
cards.ability: On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you make your own.

cards.name: Electro
cards.ability: On Reveal: +1 max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cards.name: Fenris Wolf
cards.ability: Activate: Rusurrect your opponent's highest-Power discarded or destroyed card on your side of this location.

cards.name: Klaw
cards.ability: Ongoing: The location to the right has +7 Power.

cards.name: Malekith
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a 1, 2, or 3-Cost card from your deck here, but don't reveal it until the game ends.

cards.name: Miek
cards.ability: When you discard a card, this gains +1 Power and can move next turn.

cards.name: Misery
cards.ability: On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

cards.name: Rockslide
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.

cards.name: Shadow King
cards.ability: On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

cards.name: Storm
cards.ability: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

cards.name: Surtur
cards.ability: After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.

cards.name: Typhoid Mary
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your other cards here have -1 Power.

locations.name: Valhalla
locations.ability: After turn 4, cards here repeat their On Reveal abilities.

items.name: Zabu
changes: 2/3 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less.
1/2 - On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.name: Hellcow
changes: 4/6 - Activate: Discard 2 cards from your hand.
4/7 - Activate: Discard a card from your hand.

items.name: Widow's Kiss (White Widow)
changes: 0/0 - Ongoing: This has -3 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.
0/-4 - Destroy this when your side of this location is full.

items.name: Viper
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

items.name: Kingpin, Scream, and Fisk Tower
changes: No longer affects unrevealed cards.

items.name: Scream
changes: 2/2 - When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn).

items.name: Grand Master
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

items.name: Emperor Hulkling
changes: 6/11 - At the start of the game, copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

items.name: Okoye
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.

items.name: Storm
changes: 3/2 - On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

items.name: Misery
changes: 4/7 - On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

items.name: Electro
changes: 3/2 - On Reveal: +1 max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

items.name: Rockslide
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.

items.name: Shadow King
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

changes: 5/4 - Ongoing: The location to the right has +8 Power.
5/4 - Ongoing: The location to the right has +7 Power.

changes: 1/0 - When you discard a card, this gains +1 Power and can move next turn.
